definitions: the action of escaping from or avoiding a danger, enemy, or pursuer, typically in a skillful or cunning way

examples.text: his continued elusion of the authorities frustrated the President
a lengthy trail of elusions and sidesteps

shortDefinitions: action of escaping from or avoiding danger or pursuer

definitions: the action of avoiding compliance with a law or penalty

examples.text: provisions aimed at preventing fiscal evasion and elusion
the tax elusion scheme was discovered during a targeted fiscal inquiry

shortDefinitions: action of avoiding compliance with law or penalty
